Sentencas: Yttrium doped barium cerate (BCY) a solid state ion conductor which exhibits proton conductivity under proper atmospheric conditions, is used as an electrolyte in a solid oxide fuel cell (SOFCs).
Titulo: Yttrium doped BaCeO3 thin films by spray pyrolysis technique for application in solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: In present work, nanocrystalline BaCe0.8Y0.2O2.9 (BCY20) thin films were successfully deposited onto alumina substrates by simple and economical spray pyrolysis technique (SPT) at 250 degrees C.
Titulo: Yttrium doped BaCeO3 thin films by spray pyrolysis technique for application in solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: The effect of solution concentration and annealing on physico-chemical properties of BCY20 thin film has been studied.
Titulo: Yttrium doped BaCeO3 thin films by spray pyrolysis technique for application in solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: The X-ray diffraction (XRD) studies of spray pyrolysed BCY20 films revealed polycrystalline (crystallite size 35 nm) orthorhombic structure with lattice parameters a = 8.77 angstrom, b = 6.234 angstrom and c = 6.223 angstrom.
Titulo: Yttrium doped BaCeO3 thin films by spray pyrolysis technique for application in solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: The scanning electron micrographs showed dense morphology which is very useful for electrolyte.
Titulo: Yttrium doped BaCeO3 thin films by spray pyrolysis technique for application in solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: The stoichiometry was confirmed by elemental analysis and the estimated atomic ratio was in good agreement with that of the precursor solution ratio.
Titulo: Yttrium doped BaCeO3 thin films by spray pyrolysis technique for application in solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: The most intense band at 353.26 cm(-1) observed in room temperature Raman spectrum of BCY20 film was due to vibrational mode of barium cerate.
Titulo: Yttrium doped BaCeO3 thin films by spray pyrolysis technique for application in solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: The FTIR spectra with heat treatment shows no carbon based vibration bonds, revealing absence of carbon based surface impurities in the sample.
Titulo: Yttrium doped BaCeO3 thin films by spray pyrolysis technique for application in solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: The dc conductivities measured in air and argon atmospheres at 600 degrees C were 1.7 x 10(-3) and 4.25 x 10(-3) S cm(-1), respectively.
Titulo: Yttrium doped BaCeO3 thin films by spray pyrolysis technique for application in solid oxide fuel cell
